head.supplied: Memo ¶ ¶ Has the Director of the Botanic Gardens issued any reports since 1865? A complete file exists in the Chief Secretary's Office to the year 1865 inclusive. There is also a report for 1869, but...

div.p: MS 9811, Box 1179/3, La Trobe Australian Manuscript Collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.

The p/c has Box 1.15 pencilled on it - check location entry.
Memo

Has the Director of the Botanic Gardens issued any reports since 1865? A complete file exists in the Chief Secretary's Office to the year 1865 inclusive. There is also a report for 1869, but nothing else.
If the Baron von Mueller could supply the missing reports in case they have been published he will confer a favor.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Feb 14 1872
It would appear that Ware has mis-dated his memorandum, and that he should have written 1873. See what is clearly M's response, M to [T. Ware], 15 February 1873, the dating of which to 1873 is confirmed by the reference in it to William Ferguson.
